snippet: Ahead of a two-day bus tour to thank Iowa voters, Rick Santorum suggested he has a limited relationship with Mitt Romney but an enduring one with the first caucus state.
abstract: Ahead of a two-day bus tour to thank Iowa voters, Rick Santorum suggested he has a limited relationship with Mitt Romney but an enduring one with the first caucus state.

headline.main: Recollecting Campaign Past, Santorum Hints at Future in Iowa
